cookingTips: Keep all ingredients and equipment cold; warm temperatures melt shortening and prevent flakiness
Cut chilled shortening into flour until mixture resembles coarse meal with some pea-sized pieces remaining
Add ice water gradually, mixing gently until dough just holds together; chill for 30 minutes before rolling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Emphasize the importance of keeping ingredients cold and not overworking the dough to achieve a tender, flaky crust with visible layers.
